item.title: ASP.NET Core .NET 8 RC 2: Blazor, Identity, SignalR and More
item.description: The latest release of .NET 8 Release Candidate 2 brings a lot of additions and changes to ASP.NET Core. This release is planned to be the last one before the final version of .NET 8 is released. The most notable enhancements for this release of ASP.NET Core are related to the Blazor alongside the updates regarding the Identity, API Authoring, SignalR, and new SPA templates for CLI.
item.author: (Almir Vuk)
